forum.content: I'm touched by the entering moment of the time machine. Hilarious! and I laughed so hard when the host said: "People might be watching us on cellphone while sitting on a toilet bowl...". which is exactly where I was...

forum.title: [ Fun Stuff ] Let's celebrate for "Back to the future"
